capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Ensuring administrative tasks are completed efficiently to support the team's objectives.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Managing competing demands to provide timely administrative support.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Adhering to organisational policies and ensuring compliance with audit and statutory requirements.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Providing high-quality customer service to internal and external stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Delivering high-quality support and service to the team and stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Working as part of a team to contribute towards conservation goals.

capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Undertaking financial transactions, creating purchase orders, and processing invoices.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Using computer-based systems for word processing, spreadsheet management, and records management.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.description: Handling financial transactions and managing invoices and purchase orders.

skills.name: Records Management
skills.description: Using systems for effective records management and data analysis.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.description: Maintaining high attention to detail in managing administrative tasks and financial transactions.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.description: Providing high-quality service to internal and external stakeholders.

generalRole.name: Administrative Assistant
generalRole.title: Administrative Assistant in Environmental Conservation
generalRole.description: This role involves providing administrative support within an environmental conservation context, focusing on office management, financial transactions, and compliance with organisational policies.
